Member Function Documentation

ASPOSE_DLL_EXPORT pplx::task<HttpContent> com::aspose::api::TemplateMergeApi::getMergeHtmlTemplate ( utility::string_t  templateName,
utility::string_t  dataPath,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  options,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  folder,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  storage 
)

Populate HTML document template with data located as a file in the storage.

Parameters:
templateName Template document name. Template document is HTML or zipped HTML.
dataPath Data source file path in the storage. Supported data format: XML
options Template merge options: reserved for further implementation. (optional)
folder The template document folder. (optional)
storage The template document and data source storage. (optional)

ASPOSE_DLL_EXPORT pplx::task<HttpContent> com::aspose::api::TemplateMergeApi::postMergeHtmlTemplate ( utility::string_t  templateName,
utility::string_t  outPath,
std::shared_ptr< HttpContent >  file,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  options,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  folder,
boost::optional< utility::string_t >  storage 
)

Populate HTML document template with data from the request body. Result document will be saved to storage.

Parameters:
templateName Template document name. Template document is HTML or zipped HTML.
outPath Result document path.
file A data file to populate template.
options Template merge options: reserved for further implementation. (optional)
folder The template document folder. (optional)
storage The template document and data source storage. (optional)
